version_description:
- This version of the App now takes advantage of all the wonderful new functionality on iPhone X. Face ID is fully supported.
- New rules are available to take a video or a picture or turn on lights when there is an alarm event.

- This version of the App now takes advantage of all the wonderful new functionality on iPhone X. Face ID is fully supported.
- New rules are available to take a video or a picture or turn on lights when there is an alarm event.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Now the whole family can enjoy the XFINITY Home app without needing to share account credentials. You can grant access to additional family members.
- You can easily switch between camera Live view and motion events view. You can also easily swipe between cameras and see the corresponding motion events.
- Camera thumbnail experience has been revamped to improve reliability. If you have an iCamera2 or xCam, your camera’s thumbnail will refresh every 30 seconds.
- You can easily manage contacts to receive a text notification or email when a rule is triggered.
- You can dim lights using the updated rules and scenes.

- Now the whole family can enjoy the XFINITY Home app without needing to share account credentials. You can grant access to additional family members.
- You can easily switch between camera Live view and motion events view. You can also easily swipe between cameras and see the corresponding motion events.
- Camera thumbnail experience has been revamped to improve reliability. If you have an iCamera2 or xCam, your camera’s thumbnail will refresh every 30 seconds.
- You can easily manage contacts to receive a text notification or email when a rule is triggered.
- You can dim lights using the updated rules and scenes.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Quick access to ecobee. Now you can use the Xfinity Home app to manage your ecobee smart thermostat.
- New rules! Take a photo or video at a scheduled time or whenever motion is detected.
- A sweep of bug fixes for iPhone X to improve overall performance.

- Quick access to ecobee. Now you can use the Xfinity Home app to manage your ecobee smart thermostat.
- New rules! Take a photo or video at a scheduled time or whenever motion is detected.
- A sweep of bug fixes for iPhone X to improve overall performance.

- A new rule allows you to be notified, either by text or email, whenever motion is detected around your home.​
- Added support for LIFX light bulbs, including the ability to turn on/off, dim, set or change bulb color and use with existing rules.
- Now you can set multiple light bulbs to the same color to suit any mood.

- A new rule allows you to be notified, either by text or email, whenever motion is detected around your home.​
- Added support for LIFX light bulbs, including the ability to turn on/off, dim, set or change bulb color and use with existing rules.
- Now you can set multiple light bulbs to the same color to suit any mood.

-Now you can create a rule that will play a sound on your Touchscreen when triggered.
-New color possibilities have been added to lighting automations for users equipped with capable bulbs like Philips Hue.
-A sweep of bug fixes to improve overall performance and experience.

-Now you can create a rule that will play a sound on your Touchscreen when triggered.
-New color possibilities have been added to lighting automations for users equipped with capable bulbs like Philips Hue.
-A sweep of bug fixes to improve overall performance and experience.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

bug fixes and performance improvements
bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixes a crash on iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, and 4th generation iPad
Fixes a crash on iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, and 4th generation iPad

Now you can select different lighting colors to further personalize a Scene.
Thanks to your helpful feedback, we’ve eliminated the need for an additional sign in should your device lose connectivity.
We’ve uncovered and fixed the most commonly reported crashes.

Now you can select different lighting colors to further personalize a Scene.
Thanks to your helpful feedback, we’ve eliminated the need for an additional sign in should your device lose connectivity.
We’ve uncovered and fixed the most commonly reported crashes.

We’re rolling into Spring with some fresh updates designed to make your life a little easier.

- Arm/disarm, view activity, or chat with us through 3D Touch quick actions from your home screen.
- Be sure you’re taking full advantage of every amazing feature with a quick tour. Before signing in, you can select the tour from your home screen or go to More to take a tour anytime.

We’re rolling into Spring with some fresh updates designed to make your life a little easier.

- Arm/disarm, view activity, or chat with us through 3D Touch quick actions from your home screen.
- Be sure you’re taking full advantage of every amazing feature with a quick tour. Before signing in, you can select the tour from your home screen or go to More to take a tour anytime.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Fewer bugs! We’ve cleaned up a few of the peskier bugs to improve your overall experience.
- We also fixed a few accessibility issues, including clearer labels and headings.

- Fewer bugs! We’ve cleaned up a few of the peskier bugs to improve your overall experience.
- We also fixed a few accessibility issues, including clearer labels and headings.
Continued bug sweeps! We're always looking for ways to make your experience smoother and your feedback helps us identify and fix any issues. Thanks for that.
Continued bug sweeps! We're always looking for ways to make your experience smoother and your feedback helps us identify and fix any issues. Thanks for that.

We’ve updated the look of our app icon to a crisp blue and white design. Now you can easily spot us in a crowd!
We’ve updated the look of our app icon to a crisp blue and white design. Now you can easily spot us in a crowd!

- More recording time! We’ve increased the length of recorded motion clips from 45 seconds to a full two minutes. Please note, you must have 24/7 Video Recording to view motion event clips.
- More play time! Now you can watch recorded video past the previous limit of two minutes. If there’s a moment of interest in one of your recordings, you’ll have plenty of play time to find it. Please note, you must have 24/7 Video Recording to view recorded clips.

- More recording time! We’ve increased the length of recorded motion clips from 45 seconds to a full two minutes. Please note, you must have 24/7 Video Recording to view motion event clips.
- More play time! Now you can watch recorded video past the previous limit of two minutes. If there’s a moment of interest in one of your recordings, you’ll have plenty of play time to find it. Please note, you must have 24/7 Video Recording to view recorded clips.

We know how frustrating bugs can be so we’re working hard to find and fix them as quickly as we can. If you’ve reported an issue recently, thanks for taking the time to let us know about it.

Now you can check all of your cameras from one screen. We’ve created a neatly stacked display of camera views so you can quickly monitor your home from one central screen. More views, fewer clicks!
Now you can check all of your cameras from one screen. We’ve created a neatly stacked display of camera views so you can quickly monitor your home from one central screen. More views, fewer clicks!

We’ve continued to sweep for bugs, fixing them as quickly as possible. Thanks for your help in reporting them!

For our customers with multiple cameras, you may have had an issue with camera thumbnail photos not showing up entirely or partially cut off. We’ve identified the problem and have resolved the issue.
For our customers with multiple cameras, you may have had an issue with camera thumbnail photos not showing up entirely or partially cut off. We’ve identified the problem and have resolved the issue.
Fewer bugs! We’ve cleaned up a few of the peskier bugs to improve your overall experience.

- Now when you’re viewing footage in landscape mode, you can simply tap the screen and select the Back arrow to exit. No need to re-orient to portrait mode to get to the Overview screen.
- You may have experienced a sign-in issue after disabling Face ID. Rest assured, we’ve found the bug causing this issue and sent it packing.

- Now when you’re viewing footage in landscape mode, you can simply tap the screen and select the Back arrow to exit. No need to re-orient to portrait mode to get to the Overview screen.
- You may have experienced a sign-in issue after disabling Face ID. Rest assured, we’ve found the bug causing this issue and sent it packing.

- Hello, multi-taskers! We’ve enabled split-screen support for the iPad so you can view two apps at once. You can also change the size of these windows depending on which app you’re using more.
- We’ve enhanced accessibility features on the Shop and Explore tiles for those using screen readers.
- Now there’s no need to restart your camera when enabling (or disabling) 24/7 video. Less lag time means you can watch footage even faster.
- Please note we’ll no longer be supporting iOS 10.0.

Rest easier knowing you can still rely on Xfinity Home even if your touchscreen loses power or its Internet connection. With this update, even if you're offline, you can:
- Access your Xfinity camera views
- View and operate your cloud-connected devices, like the Nest thermostat

We've also exterminated more of those pesky bugs. If you've reported an issue recently, thank you for taking the time to let us know about it.

Keep tabs on your four-legged friends with new pet detection capability. Now, XHome’s 24/7 recording feature includes a pet filter so you can quickly show only clips of pets or animals you’d like to see.

In addition, we have improved the user experience based on your feedback. As always, we’re working hard to clear out the bugs you report, so keep ’em coming.

Keep tabs on your four-legged friends with new pet detection capability. Now, XHome’s 24/7 recording feature includes a pet filter so you can quickly show only clips of pets or animals you’d like to see.

In addition, we have improved the user experience based on your feedback. As always, we’re working hard to clear out the bugs you report, so keep ’em coming.

Camera sound for Live Video and 24/7 Recording is here!
You now have the option to add one-way sound to Live Video and 24/7 Video Recording. Turn the sound on while accessing the camera, or later, under Camera Settings.
